analysis.description:
PoCGame.payout (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#121-125) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- winner.transfer(ethToTransfer) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#123)

PoCGame.loseWager (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#135-139) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#136)

PoCGame.play (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#96-113) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- winningNumber == difficulty / 2

Reentrancy in PoCGame.donateToWhale (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#128-132):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#129)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#130)

Reentrancy in PoCGame.loseWager (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#135-139):
	External calls:
	- whale.call.value(amount)(bytes4(keccak256()(donate()))) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#136)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalDonated (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#137)

Detected issues with version pragma in /../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#1): it allows old versions
PoCGame.randomSeed (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/1044.sol#46) is never used in PoCGame
